# debugSignposts

**Instance Property**

An array of debug signposts that Metal records as the GPU executes the commands of the encoder’s pass.

## Declaration

```swift
var debugSignposts: [String] { get }
```

## Inspecting execution information

- **label**: The name of the encoder that generates the error information.
- **errorState**: The execution status of the command encoder.
- **MTLCommandEncoderErrorState**: Possible error conditions for the command encoder’s commands.

items.description: The name of the encoder that generates the error information.
